snippet: The Jewish Daily Forward, one of the most widely read Jewish newspapers in the United States, was given an unusual short-term reporting visa by the Iranian authorities.
abstract: Iran's Ministry of Culture and Islamic Guidance confirms that it has granted Jewish Daily Forward, prominent newspaper among American Jews, 30-day visa; unusual step seems geared toward influencing American public opinion on nuclear deal.

byline.original: By THOMAS ERDBRINK and RICK GLADSTONE

lead_paragraph: The Jewish Daily Forward, one of the most widely read Jewish newspapers in the United States, was given an unusual short-term reporting visa by the Iranian authorities.

headline.main: Iran: Jewish Newspaper Was Granted Visa in Rare Move
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Jewish Newspaper Is Granted Visa in Rare Move
